nodes.text: Eyvind was a moisture farmer on Tatooine.

Eyvind was in love with Ariela and also Ariq Joanson's best friend. He did not agree with Joanson's plans to make peace with the moisture farmers, Tusken Raiders and the Jawas. Nonetheless, for his wedding Eyvind invited thirty-one Jawas to attend. Unfortunately, the young couple's future together was destroyed by a group of young Tuskens on a raiding venture stealing speeders from the guests, and as a result, Eyvind was killed.
"Eyvind" is a common Norwegian first name.
